name: Raspberry, Ginger, and Coconut Shake
description: Blending ripe raspberries up with super-creamy coconut milk ice cream and fresh ginger makes for a gorgeous, jewel-toned thick shake that isn't too heavy or sweet.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup vanilla coconut milk ice cream, such as So Delicious
1 teaspoon finely minced or grated fresh ginger
Additional fresh raspberries for garnish if desired

recipeInstructions.text: Add raspberries to the blender, pulse a few times, then puree on medium high speed until smooth, about 30 seconds.
Add the coconut milk ice cream and the ginger to the raspberry puree and blend just until smooth. Serve immediately, garnished with additional raspberries if desired.
